member.summary: Time vector of the data file

member.summary: Data channels collection of the data file

member.summary: Mininimum step time of the file

member.summary: Maximum step time of the file

member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:Ctrl_GraphWindow.GW_DataFile.Load_DataFile(System.String)
member.summary: Read a data file
member.param: Path of the file to read
member.returns: Reading error flag: True = No Error / False = Error

member.name: M:Ctrl_GraphWindow.GW_DataFile.Get_DataChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Return the GW_DataChannel item corresponding to the name given as argument
member.param: Name of the channel to retrieve
member.returns: GW_DataChannel item corresponding to the name given as argument
member.remarks: Return null if the GW_DataChannel item is not found

member.name: M:Ctrl_GraphWindow.GW_DataFile.DataChannelExists(System.String)
member.summary: Determine whether the GW_DataChannel corresponding to the name given as argument exist in the current object channels collection
member.param: Name of the channel to search
member.returns: True = Channel exists / False = Channel doesn't exist

member.name: M:Ctrl_GraphWindow.GW_DataFile.Get_SampleIndexAtTime(System.Double)
member.summary: Return the index of the time sample corresponding to the time value given as argument
member.param: Time value to search
member.returns: Index of the time sample corresponding to the time value given as argument
member.remarks: Return -1 if the time value is not found

member.name: M:Ctrl_GraphWindow.GW_DataFile.Get_ChannelValueAtIndex(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the sample value at the index given as argument of the channel given as argument
member.param: Name of the channel to search
Index of sample
member.returns: Channel value at the sample index
member.remarks: Return NaN if the channel is not found or if the sample index doesn't exist
